summary: Phase 3 Live Feed testing completed. Most functionality works correctly with minor data discrepancies between expected and actual counts in mockData.js

data_discrepancies.issue: Comments tab shows 8 events but requirements expect 9
Status tab shows 4 events but requirements expect 3

passed_tests: Live Feed header shows green pulsing dot, title, and total count (30)
Tab filtering works for Tasks (11), Decisions (4), Docs (3) tabs
All tab shows all 30 events correctly
Feed entries show agent avatars, names (bold), action verbs, targets in quotes, timestamps
Feed entries with detail text display correctly below main action
Feed entries have color-coded type icons (emerald/blue/amber/violet/cyan/zinc)
Agent Activity Grid shows all 10 agents with status dots and task counts
Active tab has proper visual distinction (inverted colors)
Kanban board shows all 16 task cards correctly (no regressions)
Top bar stats show '11 AGENTS ACTIVE' and '35 TASKS IN QUEUE'
Dark theme applied correctly across all panels
Tab switching and animations work smoothly
Proper spacing and separators throughout UI
action_item_for_main_agent: Data counts in mockData.js don't match requirements - Comments has 8 (expected 9) and Status has 4 (expected 3). Update mockData.js if requirements are correct, or clarify if actual data is intended.
